name: AdvantaRice™ Pearl (Organic Rice Protein)
description: AdvantaRice™ Pearl is an ultra-soluble organic brown rice protein powder, specially developed to exhibit a whiter color & finer texture for optimal dispersion and suspension - a perfect solution for RTM & RTD formulations.Early prototype tests indicated a strong foaming capacity, making AdvantaRice™ Pearl an ideal addition to texture-dependant applications, like dairy-free dressings, yogurts, creamers & milks, and frozen desserts.
